## fromBlob() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function fromBlob<Algorithm extends HashAlgorithm>(options: {
    algorithm: Algorithm;
    blob: Blob;
    subtleCrypto?: Pick<typeof globalThis.crypto.subtle, 'digest'>;
}): Promise<NamedInformationURI<Algorithm, `${string}/${string}`>>;
```
